action.name: EventRegister
action.description: Registers a TCP/IP port wishing to hook events

action.name: HookEvents
action.description: Specifies devices and event to hook

in.name: HookList
in.description: Format is \n separated list of items of the form <device>=<event_ids>. Event ids are comma separated.

action.name: ListAll
action.description: Causes the DeviceList Event to be raised (Raises DeviceList Event)

action.name: GetDeviceActions
action.description: Causes the DeviceActions Event to be raised (Raises DeviceActions Event)

action.name: GetDeviceEvents
action.description: Causes the DeviceEvents Event to be raised (Raises DeviceEvents Event)

action.name: GetDeviceInfo
action.description: Causes the DeviceInfo Event to be raised (Raises DeviceInfo Event)

event.name: DeviceList
event.description: Lists the names of all virtual devices (Raise,Poll)

event.name: DeviceActions
event.description: Lists the actions of the specified virtual device (Raise,Poll)

event.name: DeviceEvents
event.description: Lists the events of the specified virtual device (Raise,Poll)

event.name: DeviceInfo
event.description: Lists the auxiliary information about the specified virtual device (Raise,Poll)

action.name: Raise
action.description: Makes the specified interrupt pending

action.name: Clear
action.description: Clears the pending flag for the specified interrupt

action.name: Mask
action.description: Disables the specified interrupt

action.name: Unmask
action.description: Enables the specified interrupt

action.name: GetPending
action.description: Causes the Pending Event to be raised (Raises Pending Event)

action.name: GetIPL
action.description: Causes the IPL Event to be raised (Raises IPL Event)

action.name: SetIPL
action.description: Sets the IPL (Raises IPL Event)

event.name: Pending
event.description: Get the bitmask of pending interrupts (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Start
event.description: Raised just before an interrupt handler starts (Raise)

event.name: Stop
event.description: Raised just after an interrupt handler ends (Raise)

event.name: IPL
event.description: The interrupt priority level (Raise,Poll)

event.name: EnabledVecs
event.description: Get the bitmask of enabled interrupts (Poll)

action.name: Start
action.description: Starts the OS thread. Only relevant when the VECU was loaded but not started. (Raises the Start Event)

action.name: Terminate
action.description: Terminates the VECU (Raises the Terminate Event)

action.name: Pause
action.description: Suspends operation of the OS thread (Raises the Pause Event)

action.name: Restart
action.description: Resumes operation of the OS thread (Raises the Restart Event)

action.name: Reset
action.description: Resets the VECU (Raises the Reset Event)

action.name: GetInfo
action.description: Causes the GetInfo Event to be raised (Raises the GetInfo Event)

action.name: TestOption
action.description: Causes the Option event to be raised to signal if the named command-line option exists (Raises the Option Event)

action.name: ReadOption
action.description: Causes the OptionText event to be raised containing the full text of the command-line option that starts with the specified string (Raises the OptionText Event)

action.name: ReadParam
action.description: Causes the ParamText event to be raised containing the full text of the specified command-line parameter (Raises the ParamText Event)

in.name: OptNum
in.description: Number of the command-line option starting at 0

event.name: Started
event.description: Indicates that the OS thread is started (Raise)?

event.name: Paused
event.description: Indicates that the OS thread is paused (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Restarted
event.description: Indicates that the OS thread is resumed (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Reset
event.description: Indicates that the VECU is being reset (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Terminated
event.description: Indicates that the VECU is terminating (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Info
event.description: Contains auxiliary information about the VECU (Raise,Poll)

out.name: Info
out.description: List of auxiliary information about the VECU

event.name: Option
event.description: Reports if the named command-line option exists (Raise,Poll)

event.name: OptionText
event.description: Returns the text of the command-line option starting with specified text (Raise,Poll)

out.name: Text
out.description: Text of the option or empty if the option does not exist

event.name: ParamText
event.description: Returns the full texts of the specified command-line parameter (Raise,Poll)

in.name: OptNum
in.description: Number of the command-line option starting at 0

out.name: Text
out.description: Text of the nth command-line option

event.name: State
event.description: Returns the OS state (Poll)

event.name: CoreCount
event.description: Reports the number of virtual cores configured in the VECU (Poll)

action.name: Scale
action.description: Change the tick duration in ms (Updates Scale Event)

action.name: Pause
action.description: Pause the clock. No ticks occur while paused, even in manual tick mode (Updates Mode Event)

action.name: Resume
action.description: Resume the clock (Updates Mode Event)

action.name: Strategy
action.description: Strategy for Auto ticks when the host PC is busy (Updates Strategy Event)

in.name: Prefer
in.description: RealTime keeps ticks 1ms apart on average - intervals can become small. FixedInterval keeps ticks at least 1ms apart

action.name: AutoTick
action.description: Tick automatically every 1ms (Updates Mode Event)

action.name: DirectTick
action.description: Stop AutoTick and inject 0 or more ticks directly (Updates Mode Event)

action.name: DirectTickFreezesOS
action.description: When TRUE, OS is frozen after DirectTick (No associated Event)

in.name: Freeze
in.description: TRUE to freeze OS after ticking

action.name: DirectTickYield
action.description: When TRUE, VECU suspends temporarily after DirectTick completes to reduce CPU usage (Updates DirectTickYield Event)

action.name: IdleTick
action.description: Tick when vrtaIsIdle() occurs so system runs at maximum rate. (Updates Mode Event)

action.name: UpdateAndTick
action.description: Update multiple actions and optionally inject 0 or more ticks directly (Updates Mode Event)

action.name: MonitorEvents
action.description: Specify events to monitor for PostTickData event (Affects PostTickData Event)

action.name: CSLIF
action.description: Fast connection mechanism for VECUs on local host (Used by FMU/SFunction)

event.name: Scale
event.description: The tick duration in ms (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Mode
event.description: The operating mode (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Ticks
event.description: The number of ticks delivered (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Milliseconds
event.description: The number of milliseconds since start. Does not pause. (Poll)

event.name: Remaining
event.description: For DirectTick, the number ticks remaining. Reports to hook only when completed. (Raise,Poll)

event.name: PostTickData
event.description: After DirectTick, return the monitored event data. (Raise,Poll)

event.name: EventedDirectTick
event.description: Faster version of DirectTick Action. Blocks until ticks have completed so it is not necessary to hook the Remaining Event (Poll)

event.name: DirectTickYield
event.description: Value of DirectTickYield action (Poll)

event.name: Strategy
event.description: Strategy for Auto ticks when the host PC is busy (Raise,Poll)

out.name: Prefer
out.description: RealTime keeps ticks 1ms apart on average - intervals can become small. FixedInterval keeps ticks at least 1ms apart

event.name: CSLIF
event.description: Fast connection mechanism for VECUs on local host (Poll)

event.name: AppMode
event.description: The current AppMode (Poll)

event.name: ISR_VECU_SystemClock_ISR
event.description: Get ISR Status (Poll)

out.name: Count
out.description: Number of times it has started

event.name: Task_OsTask_0
event.description: Get Task Status (Poll)

out.name: Count
out.description: Number of times it has started

event.name: Task_OsTask_1
event.description: Get Task Status (Poll)

out.name: Count
out.description: Number of times it has started

event.name: Task_OsTask_2
event.description: Get Task Status (Poll)

out.name: Count
out.description: Number of times it has started

event.name: Task_OsTask_3
event.description: Get Task Status (Poll)

out.name: Count
out.description: Number of times it has started

event.name: Counter_Rte_TickCounter
event.description: Get Counter Status (Poll)

out.name: State
out.description: State is Active if the Counter has active Alarms or ScheduleTables

event.name: Table_Rte_ScheduleTable
event.description: Get ScheduleTable Status (Poll)

out.name: Next
out.description: Ticks to next expiry. 0 if disabled

action.name: IdleCount
action.description: Change the count of calls to vrtaIsIdle()

event.name: _Parent
event.description: ID of the OS this device (Poll)

event.name: IdleCount
event.description: Count of calls to vrtaIsIdle() from Os_Cbk_Idle() (Poll)

event.name: CurrentApplication
event.description: The application ID (Poll)

event.name: LastError
event.description: The most recent API error code (Poll)

event.name: RunningTask
event.description: The task that is running (Poll)

event.name: RunningISR
event.description: The category 2 ISR that is running (Poll)

action.name: Value
action.description: Set sensor value (Raises Value Event)

action.name: Maximum
action.description: Set sensor value limit (Raises Maximum Event)

event.name: Value
event.description: Sensor value (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Maximum
event.description: Sensor value limit (Raise,Poll)

action.name: Value
action.description: Set actuator value (Raises Value Event)

action.name: Maximum
action.description: Set actuator value limit (Raises Maximum Event)

event.name: Value
event.description: Actuator value (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Maximum
event.description: Actuator value limit (Raise,Poll)

action.name: Print
action.description: Sends a string to the logger (Raises Read and Lines Events)

action.name: OutputFile
action.description: Sets the name of the primary logger output file

action.name: Duplicate
action.description: Sets the name of the duplicate logger output file

event.name: Read
event.description: Content of logger text buffer (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Lines
event.description: Number of lines in logger text buffer (Raise,Poll)

out.name: Count
out.description: Number of lines in logger text buffer

action.name: Interval
action.description: Set interval in ms (Raises Interval Event)

action.name: Scale
action.description: Set the clock frequency scale factor (Raises Scale Event)

action.name: Start
action.description: Start the clock (Raises Running Event)

action.name: Stop
action.description: Stop the clock (Raises Running Event)

event.name: Interval
event.description: The clock interval in ms (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Scale
event.description: The frequency scale factor (Raise,Poll)

event.name: Running
event.description: The running state (Raise,Poll)

action.name: Minimum
action.description: Set the start value for the count

action.name: Maximum
action.description: Set the maximum value for the count

action.name: Set
action.description: Set the count value

action.name: Start
action.description: Enable counting

action.name: Stop
action.description: Disable counting

action.name: Report
action.description: Causes the Set event to be raised (Raises Set Event)

event.name: Set
event.description: The value of the count when Report action is raised (Raise,Poll)

action.name: Minimum
action.description: Set the start value for the count

action.name: Maximum
action.description: Set the maximum value for the count

action.name: Set
action.description: Set the count value

action.name: Start
action.description: Enable counting

action.name: Stop
action.description: Disable counting

action.name: Report
action.description: Causes the Set event to be raised (Raises Set Event)

event.name: Set
event.description: The value of the count when Report action is raised (Raise,Poll)

action.name: Match
action.description: Set the count value at which the match occurs (Raises Match Event)

in.name: Match
in.description: Value of count value when match occurs

action.name: Vector
action.description: Specify the interrupt vector for the interrupt to raise on match

event.name: Match
event.description: The value at which the match occurred (Raise,Poll)

out.name: Match
out.description: Value of count value when match occurs
